participants.name: Travis Addair
participants.url: Former Senior Software Engineer, AI at Super Evil Megacorp

messages.message:
Hey!

Are you hosting another one of your friday-night get-togethers tomorrow?  If so, would you mind if Rory, Jordan, and I stopped by?

-Travis

Brian
Yeah totally!  Come on by! we are wearing PJs and baking cookies too!  Next week will have a different theme.
Awesome, thanks.  Any specific time you want us to drop in?

Brian
My parties consistently start at 7:30, but people show up before to help or I am usually hanging out with someone before hand.
Also BSG is on at 9:30 here so be sure to come by before then if you want to watch the show on my amazing system.

Hey man, sorry about what happened last night.  I should have remembered that VODKA + TEQUILA = POOR CHOICE.  Anyhow, do you like red wine?  If you don't mind me stopping by again next week, I'll bring you a good cab as a token of my apologies.

Brian
LOL, no problem man.  I hope you feel better.  Eat lots of protein to make up for the food loss.  Check the group for next weeks theme!  I think we will take it easy next week.

Brian
HELLO!
Can you do me a favor and send Joe Flieger a compliment?  It's a part of a game.
